rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
降低风险的乳房切除术可降低 BRCA 变异携带者的乳腺癌发病率和死亡率劳伦斯·布隆伯格护理学院的 Kelly Metcalfe 教授和女子学院医院家族性乳腺癌研究室的研究人员共同领导的一项研究发现，对携带 BRCA1 或 BRCA2 基因变异的女性进行乳房切除术 (RRM) 可以显着降低风险降低被诊断患有乳腺癌的风险并降低死亡概率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Risk-reducing-mastectomies-lower-breast-cancer-incidence-and-mortality-in-BRCA-variant-carriers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Risk-reducing-mastectomies-lower-breast-cancer-incidence-and-mortality-in-BRCA-variant-carriers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c303dbb-8892-411e-8790-9030bb6664b0 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 22:54:48 -0500 Risk-reducing mastectomies lower breast cancer incidence and mortality in BRCA variant carriers
优化患有晚期癌症的老年人的化疗标准化疗方案主要基于对相对年轻和健康的患者进行的测试，可能对经常与其他健康问题作斗争的患有癌症的老年人造成更大的伤害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Optimizing-chemotherapy-for-older-adults-with-advanced-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Optimizing-chemotherapy-for-older-adults-with-advanced-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d93c9ee4-70ec-424c-a9ba-09fdda3c9a2f Fri, 16 Feb 2024 22:50:42 -0500 Optimizing chemotherapy for older adults with advanced cancer
评估预测医院获得性急性肾损伤的机器学习工具医院获得性急性肾损伤 (HA-AKI) 是住院患者的常见并发症，可导致慢性肾脏疾病，并与更长的住院时间、更高的医疗费用和死亡率增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Evaluating-a-machine-learning-tool-for-predicting-hospital-acquired-acute-kidney-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Evaluating-a-machine-learning-tool-for-predicting-hospital-acquired-acute-kidney-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3869c9c-5471-474c-be05-e470a05f9e78 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 22:08:34 -0500 Evaluating a machine learning tool for predicting hospital-acquired acute kidney injury
揭开大脑决策的秘密，为未来提供洞察力圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院的研究人员发现了人们如何做出涉及获取未来信息的选择的重要线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Unlocking-the-brains-decision-making-secrets-for-future-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Unlocking-the-brains-decision-making-secrets-for-future-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f38a5c89-4998-475b-9909-103c1e0ac56c Fri, 16 Feb 2024 21:55:01 -0500 Unlocking the brain's decision-making secrets for future insights
FDA 根据 NIH 研究批准奥马珠单抗用于治疗食物过敏反应今天，美国食品和药物管理局批准了单克隆抗体奥马珠单抗（Xolair）的补充生物制剂许可证，突显了美国国立卫生研究院支持的研究的重要作用，这些研究支撑了 FDA 的决定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/FDA-approves-omalizumab-for-food-allergy-reactions-based-on-NIH-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/FDA-approves-omalizumab-for-food-allergy-reactions-based-on-NIH-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fd7dc4b-778f-4b00-8013-ee3408b79156 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 21:41:05 -0500 FDA approves omalizumab for food allergy reactions based on NIH research
黑色素瘤诊断的封锁延迟使欧洲损失了 60 亿英镑和数千人的生命伦敦大学学院和巴塞尔大学医院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，由于 Covid-19 封锁导致黑色素瘤诊断的延迟可能导致整个欧洲损失超过 10 万年的生命，并造成超过 60 亿英镑的损失，这主要是间接由于生产力损失造成的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Lockdown-delays-in-melanoma-diagnosis-cost-Europe-c2a36bn-and-thousands-of-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Lockdown-delays-in-melanoma-diagnosis-cost-Europe-c2a36bn-and-thousands-of-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f1a3bfc-db6b-4b6e-9e75-dccbf5eea65d Fri, 16 Feb 2024 21:36:14 -0500 Lockdown delays in melanoma diagnosis cost Europe £6bn and thousands of lives
弗吉尼亚理工大学获得改善农村废水病原体检测的资助在大流行期间，通过检测废水来评估 COVID-19 病毒的传播情况变得很常见并广为人知，但它主要集中在城市地区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Virginia-Tech-receives-grant-for-improving-rural-wastewater-pathogen-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Virginia-Tech-receives-grant-for-improving-rural-wastewater-pathogen-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6bc91354-e439-4d47-9d73-db19754150ac Fri, 16 Feb 2024 20:12:10 -0500 Virginia Tech receives grant for improving rural wastewater pathogen detection
研究将手指长度比例与运动员的氧代谢效率联系起来组织供氧效率是 Covid-19 和心脏病等重要疾病严重程度的一个因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Study-links-finger-length-ratio-to-oxygen-metabolism-efficiency-in-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Study-links-finger-length-ratio-to-oxygen-metabolism-efficiency-in-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41d673a5-add8-4eee-828e-f8f069508f14 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 20:10:02 -0500 Study links finger length ratio to oxygen metabolism efficiency in athletes
研究表明，严重长期新冠肺炎患者的症状各不相同，与受影响的器官或免疫状态无关一份新的预印本报告了显着相关的发现，可能有助于预测严重的长期新冠病毒并了解其病因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Study-suggests-病人-with-severe-long-COVID-present-with-variable-symptoms-do-not-cluster-in-relation-to-受影响器官或免疫状态.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Study-suggests-病人-with-severe-long-COVID-present-with-variable-symptoms-do-not-cluster-in-relation-to-受影响的器官或免疫状态.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3d066b3-c089-4bdc-966a-e06b72ada4a5 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 12:00:00 -0500 Study suggests patients with severe long COVID present with variable symptoms, do not cluster in relation to organs affected or immunological states
非酒精性脂肪肝导致 2 型糖尿病患者发生心血管疾病和死亡的风险研究人员调查了 2 型糖尿病 (T2DM) 患者的非酒精性脂肪肝与全因死亡和心血管疾病之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Risk-of-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease-for-cardioangio-disease-and-all-cause-death-in-病人-with- 2 型糖尿病-mellitus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Risk-of-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease-for-cardioangio-disease-and-all-cause-death-in-病人-with- 2 型糖尿病-mellitus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=045f8a49-df5c-43cb-bcd3-83625494fe5f Fri, 16 Feb 2024 11:25:00 -0500 Risk of non-alcoholic fatty liver disease for cardiovascular disease and all cause death in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus
